title: 10 Kale Smoothie Recipes That Pack a Powerfully Healthy Punch
description: Find delicious and nutritious smoothie ideas to make with kale, such as green breakfast smoothies and detox smoothies. Get the kale smoothie recipes here.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 10 Kale Smoothie Recipes That Pack a Powerfully Healthy Punch By Corey Williams Corey Williams Corey Williams is a food writer for MyRecipes and Allrecipes. She has a decade of journalism experience. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on November 29, 2021 Close Credits: France C Looking for a green smoothie that's as delicious as it is nutritious? You've come to the right place! Whether you're looking for an easy idea to make with just a few ingredients or something a bit more complex, you'll find immune-boosting drinks full of healthy vitamins and nutrients in this collection of our best kale smoothie recipes. 01 of 11 Spinach and Kale Smoothie View Recipe Save Paula Leafy greens are blended with almond milk, peanut butter, chia seeds, and a frozen banana in this vibrant kale smoothie. "Definitely a keeper and a great way to get some healthy greens," according to reviewer jfbond1. Green Smoothie Recipes 02 of 11 Kale Banana Smoothie View Recipe Save France C A pinch of cayenne pepper lends subtle heat to this banana, avocado, and kale smoothie. Recipe creator allie850 suggests freezing the banana in chunks to speed up the blending process. 03 of 11 Kale and Pineapple Detox Smoothie View Recipe Save AllrecipesPhoto Make this incredibly easy kale smoothie with just four ingredients: kale, fresh pineapple chunks, a banana, and a can of coconut milk. 04 of 11 Kale Orange Banana Smoothie View Recipe Save Molly Even the pickiest eaters at your table (including toddlers!) will love this fresh and fruity kale smoothie, according to recipe creator Georgina. 20 Breakfast Smoothie Recipes to Start Your Day the Healthy Way 05 of 11 Cool Kale Smoothie View Recipe Save France C "This is an easy way to get raw kale into your diet," says recipe creator Ginger Paro. "The grapes masks the taste of kale and the end result is a tasty, cool smoothie!" 06 of 11 Kale Avocado Smoothie View Recipe Save Alli Shircliff What's the protein-packed secret ingredient in this creamy avocado, mango, banana, and kale smoothie? Canned white beans! 07 of 11 Green Smoothie with Kefir View Recipe Save Yoly Leafy greens pair perfectly with blueberries, kefir, cucumbers, avocados, bananas, and almonds in this kale smoothie. Kefir, a super healthy fermented dairy drink, adds creaminess and tangy flavor. 08 of 11 Tropical Smoothie with Kale View Recipe Save voraciousgirl There are only four ingredients (kale, pineapple, bananas, and almond milk) in this simple green smoothie, but it packs a powerfully nutritious punch. 15 Top Tropical Fruit Smoothie Recipes 09 of 11 Vegan Kale Smoothie View Recipe Save Tammy Lynn A blend of almond and coconut milk makes this creamy kale smoothie vegan-friendly. Reviewer and Allrecipes Allstar Tammy Lynn suggests adding a sweetener for a pleasant flavor boost. 10 of 11 Quick Kale and Turmeric Smoothie View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen Short on time? You can throw this healthy kale smoothie together in just five minutes. The recipe calls for fresh turmeric root, but reviewers say ground turmeric is a perfectly acceptable substitute. 11 of 11 More Inspiration Mackenzie Schieck Try one of Our Easiest Smoothie Recipes With 3 Ingredients or Less. Plus, explore our entire collection of Smoothie Recipes. Spinach and Banana Power Smoothie Watermelon Delight Cremesicle Smoothie Explore more: Recipes Drinks Recipes Smoothie Recipes Green Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
